message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with the design of a control policy for a random access system, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The system is modeled as a decentralized Markov decision process (DEC-MDP), which falls under the category of control and optimization (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the complexity of the optimization problem and proposes a low complexity solution, which involves mathematical analysis (cs.MA) and graph theory (cs.GT).
